description.raw:
* Adding subscribe options to ciface

* Fast publisher slow subscriber

* Revert

* Handle corrup log file

* Add sig handler to log playback

* Changelog

* Enable fast log playback

* Update command line optiosn

* ign-transport8 release branch

* Added tag ignition-transport8_8.0.0~pre1 for changeset 5677f562c6f4

* Support for defaul GCC Bionic compiler (7.4.x)

* Prepare for a second prerelease

* Added tag ignition-transport8_8.0.0~pre2 for changeset eb6ee2458d72

* Close branch ign-transport8_fix_experiemental

* Fix discovery

* Fixes

* Fix for discovery

* Fix homebrew

* Too many zeros

* Fix windows and homebrew tests

* Close branch ign-transport8-discovery-fix

* transpor8 pre3

* Close branch ign-transport8-pre3

* Added tag ignition-transport8_8.0.0~pre3 for changeset e4f2ba19f0d5

* Added tag ignition-transport8_8.0.0~pre3 for changeset 0fad8179bef5

* Updated subscriber output for messages tutorial

* Adding verbiage, style, link fixes

* Small language edits (online with Bitbucket)

* Small language edits (online with Bitbucket)

* Small edits (online with Bitbucket)

* added missing topic declaration to subscribe options

* 04_messages.md edited online with Bitbucket

* Close branch MaryaB/messages

* 02_installation.md edited online with Bitbucket

* fixed relative links and intro wording

* Update docker dependencies

* Close branch t8_tutorial_out_update

* Prepare for 8.0.0

* Added tag ignition-transport8_8.0.0 for changeset 6ab0cd7f1306

* touch up edits

* touch up edits

* update readme with cli workaround

* Close branch readme_cli

* small edits transport_contribute

* Working on a flood testing

* Fix missing messages

* Comment

* Close branch transport8_docker

* Fix tests

* Changelog

* Close branch fast_playback

* Added test

* Tweak

* Do not use experimental::filesystem (support for VS2019)

* Close branch ign-transport7-discovery-fix

* Close branch signhandler_log_playback

* fixed links with \ref

* Close branch ciface_sub_opts

* Close branch handle_corrupt_file

* Close branch MaryaB/nodesandtopics

* Fix codecheck

* documentation

* Close branch flood_testing

* 7.2.0

* Added tag ignition-transport7_7.2.0 for changeset 9c0f2b09082b

* Fix ciface struct

* Changelog

* update transport7 changelog

* Close branch transport72_changelog

* Changelog.md edited online with Bitbucket

* Close branch fix_struct_ciface

* Added tag ignition-transport7_7.2.1 for changeset a70ec80c29f5

* update 8.0.0 changelog and add new PR's to 8.x.x changelog

* Fix logic for skip Windows

* Close branch ign-transport8_vs19

* Changelog.md edited online with Bitbucket

* Close branch transport7_to_transport8_20191217
